english.segment1: Get in, get in, it feels like it's almost time. Act like it, you know you'll get the first prize. Sickness makes us larger then life
english.segment3: Here, here's a message for your phone. I wanted you to know this is getting. out of hand
english.segment4: Drinkin', drinkin' I'm feelin' oh so slow. Now waitin', waitin' for that feeble. last round. This all makes us smaller that life
english.segment6: Here, here's a message for your phone. I wanted you to know this is getting. out of hand. Here, here's an idea for your book. Open up and take a look inside. It is filled with lies
english.segment7: But what you wanna be. When you're doin' what you do. Free what you wanna free. When you're comin' so unglued. Don't act like you have so speak. Your thoughts right now
